com.googlecode.transloader
Interface Transloader

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultTransloader
public interface Transloader

The API by which to wrap objects that reference Classes from foreign ClassLoaders.

Author:
Jeremy Wales

Field Summary
static Transloader DEFAULT
          The default implementation of Transloader which will produce ObjectWrappers configured with CloningStrategy.MAXIMAL for Objects and ClassWrappers for Classes.
 
Method Summary
 ClassWrapper wrap(Class classToWrap)
          Wraps the given Class in a ClassWrapper.
 ObjectWrapper wrap(Object objectToWrap)
          Wraps the given object in an ObjectWrapper.
 

Field Detail

DEFAULT

static final Transloader DEFAULT
The default implementation of Transloader which will produce ObjectWrappers configured with CloningStrategy.MAXIMAL for Objects and ClassWrappers for Classes.

Method Detail

wrap

ObjectWrapper wrap(Object objectToWrap)
Wraps the given object in an ObjectWrapper.

Parameters:
objectToWrap - the object to wrap
Returns:
the wrapper around the given object

wrap

ClassWrapper wrap(Class classToWrap)
Wraps the given Class in a ClassWrapper.

Parameters:
classToWrap - the Class to wrap
Returns:
the wrapper around the given Class
